title: 1800 Mechanical Movements, Devices and Appliances
author: Hiscox Gardner D.
desc: Hiscox Gardner D. 1800 Mechanical Movements, Devices and Appliances [Dover Science Books] 16 ed. 2007 [pdf 416sc 409+1c. 90.38mb]A fascinating compendium of early-20th-century mechanical devices, this expansive work rangesfrom basic hooks and levers to complex machinery used in steam, motive, hydraulic, air, and electric power, navigation, gearing, clocks, mining, and construction.More than 1,800 engravings include simple illustrations and detailed cross-sections.
